thread.title: Joanne P
thread.title_full: Park Street Bathrooms reviewed by Joanne P

author: Joanne P
title: Joanne P
text: Excellent customer service with very polite and helpful staff. Fast and efficient delivery of goods with excellent communication throughout the whole process. I would not hesitate to buy from Park Street Bathrooms again and would definitely recommend them to friends and family.
